body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of George W. Blair and Matilda Blair. Resident in Johnson County in 1850 and 1860. Served in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia as private from May 21, 1864 to June 21, 1864.
